firstNightReminder: Show the Onmyoji 2 good and 2 evil character tokens. Only 2 are in-play.
name: Onmyoji
ability: You start knowing 2 good and 2 evil characters. Only 2 are in play.

firstNightReminder: Point to the players marked with the Shopkeeper's "Drunk" and "Customer" reminder tokens. :reminder: :reminder:
name: Shopkeeper
ability: You start knowing 2 good players. One of them will be drunk, even if you are dead.

firstNightReminder: Point left or right. If evil players are the same distance from te Qin Tianjian, give a thumbs down.
name: Astronomer
ability: On your first night, you'll learn the direction of the nearest evil player from you. If you are sitting next to an evil player, you learn false information.

firstNightReminder: The Doctor points to a player. Show them a word related to the ability.
otherNightReminder: The Doctor points to a player. Show them a word related to the ability.
name: Doctor
ability: Each night, pick a player: you learn a word related to their ability.

firstNightReminder: The Guide chooses 2 players. Nod or shake your head.
otherNightReminder: The Guide chooses 2 players. Nod or shake your head.
name: Guide
ability: Each night, pick 2 players: you learn if an evil player chose them tonight.

firstNightReminder: Show the Lion Dancer a character token. Once per game, show one of the Demon Bluffs. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: Show the Lion Dancer a character token. Once per game, show one of the Demon Bluffs. :reminder:
name: Lion Dancer
ability: Each night, learn an in play character. Once per game, you learn one of the Demon Bluffs.

otherNightReminder: The Broker selects 2 living players. :reminder: :reminder:
name: Broker
ability: Each night, pick 2 living players: if they are the same alignment, any player who selects one of them, chooses the other instead.

name: Buddhist Monk
ability: Each night, the first time an evil player's ability affects your living neighbours, it has no effect and you are told you protected someone.

otherNightReminder: The Secret Police chooses a player. :reminder:
name: Secret Police
ability: Each night*, pick a player: if they die before dusk, you die instead.

otherNightReminder: The Taoist Monk chooses a player.
name: Taoist Monk
ability: Each night*, pick a player: if they are the Demon, you die, and no other players can die tonight.

otherNightReminder: The Watcher will give a number. :reminder: :reminder: If a player marked with the Watcher's Vigilant reminder token dies, the Watcher is the only player who can die tonight.
name: Watcher
ability: Each night*, guess the distance from you of the first player to die tonight. If correct, nobody will die tonight, except you might.

firstNightReminder: The Travelling Merchant may pick a player. If they do, show them all current reminder tokens on that player. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Travelling Merchant may pick a player. If they do, show them all current reminder tokens on that player. :reminder:
name: Travelling Merchant
ability: Once per game, at night, pick a player: you learn all reminder tokens currently applied to that player.

otherNightReminder: The Alchemist may choose to see part of the Grimoire
name: Alchemist
ability: Once per game, at night*, you can choose to look at part of the grimoire. The more dead players, the more you can see, up to half the Grimoire.

otherNightReminder: The Feng Shui Master might pick 2 players. :reminder: :reminder: Point to the player who is closer to the Demon
name: Feng Shui Master
ability: Once per game, at night*, pick 2 players (not yourself): Learn which of them is closer to the Demon. If both players are of opposite alignment, you recieve false information.

name: Face Changer
ability: Each day, if you are mad that you are a good character, you gain that character's abilities that night until dusk.

name: Concubine
ability: Once per game, the Storyteller may break the rules in your favour. That night, you learn how the rules were broken.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon has the Singer's Audience reminder token applied, the Singer dies.
name: Singer
ability: Once per game, during the day, you may hold a performance and choose any number of players to be the audience. If the Demon is in the Audience, you die tonight.

otherNightReminder: Show the Judge the player marked with the Nominated Today reminder, then replace it with the Already Nominated reminder. :reminder: :reminder:
name: Judge
ability: When you nominate a player for the first time, learn their role that night. Outsiders might register as Minions or Demons to your ability.

name: Soothsayer
ability: If an evil player chooses you with their own ability at night, they instead choose another evil player.

firstNightReminder: The Strategist might be Evil. Point to 3 players.
name: Strategist
ability: You don't know your alignment (You might be evil). On your first night, learn 3 players. Only two are the same alignment as you.

name: Enlightened One
ability: You think you are an Outsider, but you are not. If an evil player's ability affects you, you become a not-in-play Townsfolk until dusk.

firstNightReminder: Wake all Actors, let them make eye contact.
name: Actor
ability: All actors know each other. Whoever wins loses, and whoever loses wins, even if all Actors are dead. [All good players are Actors]

otherNightReminder: If the Rebel or the player marked Unbroken dies by execution, the other becomes Evil.
name: Rebel
ability: On your first night, pick a player (not yourself): if they are executed first, you become evil. If you are executed first, they become evil.

firstNightReminder: The Bad Boy chooses two good characters. :reminder: :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Bad Boy chooses two good characters. :reminder: :reminder:
name: Bear Cub
ability: Each night, pick 2 good characters: they recieve false information until dusk.

otherNightReminder: If the Evil Star dies, one of their good living neighbours might die.
name: Malefic
ability: If you die, one of your living neighbours may die as well.

name: Bartender
ability: One of your good neighbours is drunk, even if you are dead.

otherNightReminder: If the Mortician nominated the Demon and the Demon was executed, wake the Mortician, show them the **YOU ARE** token, then the demon token.
name: Mortician
ability: If you nominate and execute the Demon, you become an evil Demon. If there are 4 or less players alive (Travellers don't count), you lose your power.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon, show the **THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU** token, then show the Scholar token.
name: Scholar
ability: The Demon knows you are in play. Once per game, the demon may visit the storyteller and guess who the Scholar is, if they guess correctly, the Demon can pick a player tonight: they die.

name: Magistrate
ability: On your first night, learn a secret word. The first time an Evil player says this word, the day ends immediately.

otherNightReminder: If the Seductress died today by execution, wake the Charmed player, and show them the "YOU ARE" token and a Thumbs Down
name: Seductress
ability: On your first night, choose a player: They are told that the Seductress is in play. If you die by execution, they become Evil that night.

firstNightReminder: The Gu Diao will choose a direction. :reminder: Show the Gu Diao the **THIS PLAYER IS** token, then their character token.
otherNightReminder: The Gu Diao will choose a direction. :reminder: Show the Gu Diao the **THIS PLAYER IS** token, then their character token.
name: Gu Diao
ability: Each night, choose left or right: The next living good player in that direction is poisoned and may register as Evil and a Minion. You learn their role.

firstNightReminder: The Winemaker will choose a character and provide the relevant information. :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Winemaker will choose a character and provide the relevant information. :reminder:
name: Winemaker
ability: Each night, choose a good character and give the corresponding information. When that character learns that information, it learns what you gave instead. [-1 Outsider]

name: Curser
otherNightReminder: If any player has the Curser's NOMINATED reminder token, they die.
ability: The first player who nominates you while you are alive dies tonight, even if you are dead.

name: Corpse Man
ability: Your nearest townsfolk neighbours register as alive the first time they die. [-1 Outsider]

name: Yokai
ability: Townsfolk may register as Outsider, Outsiders may register as Townsfolk. Demons may register as Minions. You may register as a Demon. [+1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: The Warden chooses up to 3 players. :reminder: :reminder: :reminder:
otherNightReminder: The Warden chooses up to 3 players. :reminder: :reminder: :reminder:
name: Warden
ability: Each night, pick between 1 and 3 players. If one is executed today, the other die that night. Otherwise, one of them dies that night.

firstNightReminder: Skip the Minion and Demon info steps, still show the Demon their Bluffs.
otherNightReminder: The first time a Minion dies, complete the Minion and Demon info steps. The Chaos chooses a player. :reminder:
name: Chaos
ability: Each night*, pick a player: they die. Demons and minions don't know each other. When a minion dies for the first time, they learn who each other are that night. [+1 Minions]

otherNightReminder: Gluttony may choose any number of players, if they are all different character types, they all die.
name: Gluttony
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players (Not travellers): if they are all different character types, they die. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Trickster chooses a player. :reminder: If they did not vote today, they choose another player. :reminder:
name: Trickster
ability: Each night*, pick a player: they die. If you didn't vote today, you can act twice tonight.

otherNightReminder: The Tao Wu chooses a player. :reminder: If they choose an Outsider, they may choose again. :reminder:
name: Tao Wu
ability: Each night*, pick a player: they die. Once per night, if you kill an ousider in this way, you can act again. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Dream-Eating Tapir chooses a player. :reminder:
name: Dream-Eating Tapir
ability: Each night*, pick a player, they die. Players who select you with their ability select themselves instead. [-1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Qion Qi chooses a player. :reminder:
name: Qionqi
ability: Each night*, pick a player: they die. All Outsiders might register as evil & a Minion or a Demon.

otherNightReminder: If a player is marked with the River Bo's "Nominated" reminder, they might die.
name: River Bo
ability: If you nominate a player of your alignment, they might die that night

name: Beggar
ability: Each day, you can publicly ask another player to choose any non-demon character. You gain that ability until dawn.
